description: Virtual Assistant that helps customers to navigate our online shop and to submit orders.

output.text: We can offer different colors. What do you like?
What kind of product do you want to purchase?
We have many colors for @product. What do you like?
We can offer different colors. What do you like?
First, your @product will be used in which occasion? Elegant, casual or sport?
What kind of material do you prefer?
Do you want @product for elegant occasions, casual or sport activities?
We can offer different colors. What do you like?
What kind of fabric do you like for your sweater?
What kind of material do you like?
What kind of material do you prefer for your @product?

values.text: Our shirts are made of cotton or silk.
For shoes, we have leather, patent leather, or cotton.
For bags, we use real leather or cotton.
We have sweaters made of wool, cotton or cashmere.
Do you need help?
How can I help you?
I'm here to help you.
Just ask me something and I'll help you.
I can help you with browsing our online shop catalog, I can give you some advices and I can place orders for you.
Hello, nice to meet you.
Hello, welcome!
Hello, we just met before.
Hello.
Ok, what kind of help do you need on <? $product ?>?
I didn't understand. You can try rephrasing.
Can you reword your statement? I'm not understanding.
I didn't get your meaning.
Hello! I'm Watson, welcome to our Online Shop! How can I help you?
Hello, my name is Watson! I'm here to help you in our Online Shop.
Welcome to our Online Shop! I'm Watson, how can I help you?
